contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Thousands Visit Qatar National Library’s Booth at 26th Doha International Book Fair

childMarkdownRemark.html:
The Qatar National Library (QNL), a member of Qatar Foundation booth at the recently held 26th Doha International Book Fair attracted thousands of visitors with the library receiving over 1,500 new member registrations.

Among the visitors in attendance were the event’s guest of honour, Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan, who opened the ten-day Book Fair, His Highness the Father Emir Sheikh Hamad bin Khalifa Al Thani, Her Highness Sheikha Moza bint Nasser, His Excellency Dr Hamad Bin Abdulaziz Al-Kuwari, Qatar’s Minister of Culture, Arts and Heritage, Algerian Minister of Culture, Mr Azzedine Mihoubi, as well as other senior literary figures.

QNL’s team hosted a range of interactive presentations and activities about the library’s wealth of learning resources including highlights of QNL’s digital resources, engaging events for children and families, and registration activities led by the library’s team.

For the full story, please click here.
